mapper.select: select u.user_id as meeting_master_id, u.profile_img as master_profile_img, cl.meeting_Crew_no as meeting_Crew_no, u.nick_name as crew_nick_name, cl.role, cl.interview_title as interview_title, cl.interview as interview, cl.crew_condition as crew_condition from meeting_crew_list cl, users u where u.user_id = cl.crew_id and cl.meeting_no= #{meetingNo} order by cl.role desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT comu.community_no, comu.community_writer_id, comu.category, comu.community_user_grade, comu.community_title, comu.community_writer_nick_name, comu.community_detail, comu.community_write_date, comu.community_views, comu.community_like, comu.import_rank, comu.community_view_condition, up.file_name FROM community comu, upload up WHERE comu.community_writer_id = #{userId} and comu.community_no = up.community_no ORDER BY comu.community_no desc ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}
